name: The Perfect Unit
description:
The Perfect Unit is a puzzle. On each level you need to arrange items around the room in the correct order to bring the robot to the exit.
Each object has a different effect on the robot: toss it, accelerate it, etc. The number of items is limited.

In the role of a small robot you find yourself a participant in a certain experiment. In a huge mansion specifically for you prepared several rooms with traps which you must avoid.
There are also two other people in the house: the professor who created you and his maid who manages this mansion. As the game progresses more details are revealed about
goals of your creation and plans for your. Who do you believe? Your choice will depend on the outcome of this intricate story.

Feature of game:
  • storyline
  • characters voiced by the actors
  • two endings
  • intricate puzzles
  • nice graphics
  • atmospheric music
